#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int num[10001];
	memset(num,0,sizeof(num));
	for(int i=0;i<n;++i) {
		int temp;
		cin>>temp;
		num[temp]++;
	}
	int sum=0;
	for(int i=0;i<10001;++i) 
	sum=sum+num[i]/2;
	if(sum==0)
	cout<<"-1"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<sum-1<<endl;
	return 0;
}
